pages.heading: Donate
pages.bodyText:
Support Our Mission

Your generous donations help us provide valuable resources and create engaging events for elderly individuals. By contributing to the ElderConnect Foundation, you are helping us foster a sense of community, support, and empowerment for seniors.

How Your Donations Help

  • Event Organization: Funds help us organize and host community events that connect seniors and reduce isolation.
  • Resource Development: Donations support the creation and maintenance of our resource hub, providing access to vital services and information.
  • Program Expansion: Your contributions allow us to expand our programs and reach more elderly individuals in need.

Ways to Donate

  • Online Donation: Visit our Donation Portal to make a secure online contribution.
  • Monthly Giving: Set up a recurring donation to provide ongoing support. Learn more on our Monthly Giving Page.
  • Corporate Sponsorship: Partner with us as a corporate sponsor. Contact us at sponsor@elderconnect.org for more information.
  • In-Kind Donations: If you have goods or services to offer, please reach out to us at donations@elderconnect.org.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about donating or need assistance, please contact our support team:

  • Email: support@elderconnect.org
  • Phone: (123) 456-7891
